In this episode, the G-Men are sent to the Ozarks to track down gold stolen from the U.S. Government. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: An outlaw gang is stealing gold from Chinese placer miners, then driving off their claims with outrageous taxes. Because they're Chinese, they can't sue the local government agents. With Stoney posing as a Chinese miner and Pat pretending to be a representative of an Eastern engineering company, the U.S. government tries to bring an end to the careers of the outlaw gang and crooked state government agents.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Spur Line to Shady Rest
programme.desc: The Shady Rest hotel is threatened when a railroad detective comes to investigate a forgotten spur line on the property. Creator Paul Henning followed up the success of The Beverly Hillbillies with this charming CBS comedy that ran for 222 episodes. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Quick Hide the Railroad
programme.desc: Kate uses her charms to keep Homer Bedloe from catching the train to Pixley. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Bedloe: Charles Lane. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A rancher is shot dead after discovering oil on his property. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog..The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951 .It was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: An ex-con is released from prison seeking vengeance against those who put him there. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode first aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Matt and Frankie arrivein the California gold fields where Frankie is kidnapped by the infamous bandit Joaquin Murietta. Without his usualy partner, Matt enlists the help of Captain Harry Love. Starring Jim Davis, Mary Castle, and Robert Anderson. Look for Rick Jason as Murietta. Jason would later go on to star in the popular ABC war series Combat!

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Following the murder of a railroad agent, Matt and Frankie work to bring the vengeful Tiburcio Vasquez to justice. Starring Jim Davis, mary Castle,Anthony Caruso, Edward Colmas, Lillian Molieri, and Eddie Parker. Also, look for Glenn Strange as Sheriff Billy Rowland. Strange was known for playing Frankenstein's monster in several Universal pictures, as well as a recurring role on Gunsmoke. Also, Eddie Parker, who plays a trapper in this episode, was one of Hollywood's most revered stuntmen. Directed by William Witney. Epsiode oringinally aired in 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, the Judge and Jeff take on the richest man in the valley over water rights. Though the rich villain has ensnared young Hugh in outlaw ways, the lawmen are determined to set Hugh on a better path. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, Jeff Taggert's brother is accused of robbing the Del Rio bank. While investigating the case, Jeff is implicated in the hold up. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E23 The Saga of Clement O' Toole
programme.desc: Mistaken for a notorious outlaw, a young man struggles to convince the townspeople that he didnt commit a stagecoach robbery. Initially, Annie and Susan Meriwether believe him, but his innocence comes into question when he is present during a bank robbery in which the outlaws seem to recognize him. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: With the sheriff off looking for an outlaw, a fake sheriff takes his place, leading to a senseless murder. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This enetertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye becomes embroiled in a fortune hunter's search for treasure. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild.Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook are assigned to escort an accused criminal to his hanging.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After shooting Luke Grayson in self-defense, Ben Cartwright must protect himself from Graysons son, Todd, who seeks to avenge his fathers death.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC.

programme.title: Crashing Thru
programme.desc: Down the danger trail sweeps a crimson fury... as Renfrew rides again! In this action-packed adventure, Sgt. Renfrew must face off against a group of criminals involved in a gold robbery. With his partner, Constable Kelly, wounded in a gunfight, Renfrew must stop the thieves on his own. Directed by Elmer Clifton; starring James Newill and Warren Hull, this is one adventure you won't want to miss!

programme.title: Days of Jesse James
programme.desc: Famed American western actor and singer Roy Rogers once again plays himself in this Jesse James tale that's a twist on the familiar formula. When he is summoned to bring Jesse to justice after the known villain is suspected of a bank robbery, Rogers soon discovers that Jesse has been framed and that the owner of the bank has robbed his own bank posing as Jesse. Fast-paced and fun, this classic Roy Rogers western directed by Joseph Kane (Dakota) features a whole host of original songs sung by the great Rogers himself.

programme.title: Hands Across The Border
programme.desc: Roy Rogers and Trigger star in this Republic Pictures western about horse breeders vying for a contract with the U.S. Army. The cast also includes such favorites as Onslow Stevens and Guinn Big Boy Williams, while songs include Hey Hey (It's a Great Day), Dreaming to Music, and The Girl with the High Button Shoes. For movie buffs: The music for the title song, Hands Across the Border, was composed by none other than Hoagy Carmichael!

programme.title: Daniel Boone, Trailblazer
programme.desc: Daniel Boone (Bruce Bennett) battles Shawnee warriors as he leads a band of settlers into Kentucky in this frontier potboiler from Albert C. Gannaway Productions. Made at the height of Hollywood's fascination with pioneer days, the film also stars Lon Chaney Jr. as Chief Blackfish, and country singer Faron Young as a handsome young suitor for Boone's daughter. There's plenty of action and danger here as the Shawnee are convinced that Boone is trying to steal their land. But Boone is ready, not even fearing death by tomahawk. It isn't how you die, Boone says. It's what you live for.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: During the French and Indian War, Alice and Cora Munro are joined by Magua in the search for their father, a British officer. Little do they know, their father is being held captive by the Huron warriors, and Magua intends to betray them. Uncas, the last surviving warrior of the Mohican tribe and Hawkeye set out to rescue the hostages and the sisters before it's too late.

programme.title: The Dawn Rider
programme.desc: John Wayne was still a few years from major stardom when he appeared as John Mason, a man seeking revenge for his fathers murder. Marion Burns stars as Alice, Masons love interest, while Reed Howes stars as Masons friend and rival for Alices affection. When Mason finally tracks down the man responsible for his fathers death, will Ben help, or stand in his way? Produced by Lone Star Pictures, the group behind many of Waynes early films, The Dawn Rider is a stirring yarn about the price of vengeance.

programme.title: One-Eyed Jacks
programme.desc: Dad Longworth robs a Mexican bank, takes the loot, and leaves his partner Rio to be captured. However, Rio escapes capture and searches for Dad in California.

programme.title: The Light of Western Stars
programme.desc: Knights of the sage-brush roar across the plains in this western drama from Harry Sherman Productions. Victor Jory ( Papillon, Gone With The Wind), stars as a ranch foreman wrongly arrested for murder. The memorable cast includes Tom Tyler (Stage Coach, Adventures of Captain Marvel), plus Noah Beery Jr (The Rockford Files) and in one of his earliest feature roles, Alan Ladd (The Blue Dahlia, Shane).

programme.title: Gunsmoke Ranch
programme.desc: Flagg is relocating flood victims to Gunsmoke Ranch. The Three Mesquiteers know Flagg to be a crook and try to warn them. They ignore the warning and improve the land only to find that it has been condemned for a new dam.

programme.title: Law of the Pampas
programme.desc: Murder below the Equator...and Hopalong Cassidy races to action in the heart of the wild Pampas country !Hoppy (William Boyd) and his pal Lucky (Russell Hayden) head to South America to look after a herd of cattle sold by Cassidy's boss to an Argentine rancher. Unfortunately, the scoundrel Ralph Merritt (Sidney Blackmer) wants the cattle, and he's not above hiring some dangerous characters to do his dirty work. It's a test of blazing guns...under a blazing sun! Can the boys of Bar 20 lay down the law in a lawless place like the Pampas? Can Hoppy and his gang succeed in what is truly a last frontier? Watch and see!

programme.title: A Lust to Kill
programme.desc: An imprisoned outlaw escapes and goes on the hunt for his brothers murderers, who just happen to be members of the outlaws own gang. He and his beloved hit the trail, but are pursued by local law enforcement, who have their own plans for justice. Starring Don Megowan, Jim Davis, and Allison Hayes.

programme.title: Fighting Fury
programme.desc: A THRILLING TALE OF REVENGE AND REDEMPTION! Based on the story Triple Cross for Danger by the widely lauded Western author Walter J. Coburn, Fighting Fury is a thrilling take on the Western revenge drama. Portraying both a father and his son, star of silent and sound cowboy adventure films, Jack Hoxie (Trouble Busters, Law and Lawless) exudes the classic American rustic charm that still defines the genre. The film spins the yarn of Clay Hill Jr. (Hoxie), a Spanish-American boy raised by a Mexican servant who vows bloody vengeance on three malicious ranchers after they murder his parents and turn his life upside down. Featuring fine supporting performances from genre heavies Helen Holmes,...

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney take time out from their duties to try and collect the bounty posted on a legendary golden wolf that roams the Colorado foothills. A couple of wolf hunters don't take kindly to a pair of amateur hunters horning in on their range and attempt to drive the G-Men away before they can capture or kill their quarry.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney travel to Wyoming to oversee a land opening and end up playing nursemaid to a pair of identical twin pranksters and a kooky Chinese cook. Meanwhile, a trio of outlaws are pursuing the twins seeking information they possess. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The President Who Came to Dinner
programme.desc: President of the railroad comes to visit the Shady Rest hotel with the intention to terminate the Cannonball's service. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Is There a Doctor in the Roundhouse
programme.desc: Railroad CEO Norman Curtis breaks the Cannonball's throttle lever, threatening the success of the Shady Rest Hotel's annual jamboree. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Norman Curtis: Roy Roberts. Directed by David Alexander.Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho work to uncover a cattle rustling operation.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog..The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951. This episode aired in 1950. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho investigate when a railway detective is found dead.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode first aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Jim Davis stars as Matt Clark, a railroad detective who chases outlaws preying on the railroads of the west. In this episode he has to deal with the legendary Chief Crazy Horse (George Keymas) Also starring Mary Castle, Chubby Johnson, John Holland, and Alma Beltran. Directed by William Witney. Episode originally aired in 1954.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detectives Matt and Frankie track down Black Bart, a famous criminal responsible for a string of stage coach robberies. .Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle.Also starring Arthur Space, Sammy Ogg, Marc Hamilton, Frank Sully, and I. StanfordJjolly. Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954. Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White.Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Sheriff Blade arrives from Comstock to arrest rancher Del Randall, but the Judge thinks the charges are trumped up. Bean and Taggart put Del in jail for safety while they investigate Blade's connection to suspiciously wealthy Mendenhall. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. When a young man seeking his birthright is accused of murder he makes a run for it. After a posse incurs several more deaths the Judge begins to realize things don't add up. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Waiting to hear whether or not gold has been struck in the mine, Annie discovers a beloved stagecoach is being driven by the daughter of the owner, whos threatening to sell the stage so he can pocket the money. When word comes back that there is no gold in the money, Annie becomes suspicious and begins investigating. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Annie Calls Her Shots
programme.desc: After a jailed Dobie escapes from jail, Dobie and Tagg find themselves kidnapped, forcing a desperate Annie to rescue her brother. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: The Mingo False Faces are accused of a series of thefts sweeping the valley.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper.Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook are turned away from a town due to the Black Plague.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The Cartwrights try to invalidate a Spanish land grant to stop the De La Cuesta family from taking part of the Ponderosa and all of the Carson Valley settlers' land.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Home in Oklahoma
programme.desc: The entire gang is here! Roy Rogers, Dale Evans, Gabby Hayes, and Trigger are all involved in a murder mystery involving the death of a wealthy ranch owner. Songs include I Wish I Was A Kid Again and Cowboy Ham and Eggs.

programme.title: Shine on Harvest Moon
programme.desc: Jackson and his gang are cattle rustlers holed up in Jackson Hole Wyoming. Roy's partner Brower was once Jackson's partner and is now suspected of being in cahoots with him. Someone is tipping off Jackson as to the cattle's whereabouts and when Roy learns who it is he has a plan to trap Jackson and clear his partner. Starring Roy Rogers, Lynne Roberts, and Myrtle Wiseman as 'Lulu Belle. Directed by Joseph Kane.

programme.title: Heart of the Golden West
programme.desc: Roy Rogers, Gabby Hayes, and Smiley Burnette team up to protect the ranchers of Cherokee City from the false charges of illegal cattle trafficking. It may seem like the odds are against Roy, but just watch as he changes the course of the law with his flaming bullets, and, of course, a few songs. For trivia buffs: Smiley Burnette joined Roy because Gene Autry, the actor for whom he usually served as a sidekick, had joined the service!

programme.title: Daniel Boone
programme.desc: In 1775, Daniel Boone (George O'Brien) leads thirty colonial families to Kentucky where they face the threats of Native American marauders led by rebel Simon Girty (John Carradine). That's just the beginning, for there are even more dangers and clashes ahead for Boone and his party. With a cast that includes Ralph Forbes, Heather Angel, and lovable child star Dickie Jones, director David Howard takes us through one of the most exciting periods in American history!

programme.title: The Hanged Man
programme.desc: After a condemned gunfighter (Steve Forrest) survives his own hanging, he helps a young widow stop a pitiless land baron from taking her ranch. This television feature boasts a strong cast of recognizable characters, including Will Geer, Sharon Acker, Dean Jagger, BarBara Luna, and Cameron Mitchell. Director Michael Caffey would go on to work on such hit shows as Barnaby Jones and MacGyver. Also, look for John Mitchum, younger brother of Robert, in a small role. This movie originally aired on ABC-TV and was considered the pilot for a possible series. Writer/producer Andrew Fenady was behind several opular TV shows such as Branded and The Rebel, as well as the 1970 John Wayne feature, Chisum.

programme.title: Riders of Destiny
programme.desc: John Wayne sings! Well, not really. His voice was dubbed here, but as Singin Sandy Saunders hes still able to write the code of justice with a blazing sixgun! Hes a government agent out to help a group of ranchers in their battle with a villain who is tying up local water rights. Also starring Gabby Hayes, Al St. John, Yakima Canutt, and Cecilia Parker, Riders of Destiny was filmed early in Waynes career it was his first for Lone Star but the unmistakable swagger is already in place!

programme.title: Kaligula
programme.desc: Dramatyzacja dotycząca dojścia do władzy Cezara i późniejszego panowania Kaliguli, jednego z najsłynniejszych przywódców starożytnego Rzymu.

programme.title: Puppy Star Christmas
programme.desc: Rodzina Pup Star właśnie się powiększyła! Nowe szczenięta: Cindy, Rosie, Charlie i Brody poznają prawdziwe znaczenie Bożego Narodzenia. Podczas gdy złoczyńcy będą próbować zniszczyć święta, maluchy trafią na Biegu Północny i ocalić Świętego Mikołaja i ducha świąt.

programme.title: Wesołych Świąt
programme.desc: Komedia familijna opowiadająca o zazdrości, starciu sąsiadów, dekorowaniu domu i… o prawdziwym duchu Świąt. Dla optometrysty Steve’a Fincha Święta to najważniejszy czas w roku. Od wielu lat mężczyzna kontynuuje płynące z głębi serca, lecz ckliwe tradycje Świąt Bożego Narodzenia.

programme.title: Sex Drive
programme.desc: Nastolatek rozpaczliwie, chcący stracić dziewictwo, przekonuje swoich przyjaciół, żeby pojechali z nim w podróż, aby mógł spotkać się z dziewczyną poznaną przez internet, ale wycieczka szybko zmienia się w serię zabawnych wpadek.

programme.title: 400 kul
programme.desc: Dwaj żołnierze w Afganistanie walczą o przetrwanie, kiedy ściga ich zbuntowany oddział poszukujący chipów naprowadzających rakiety.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Jack Conrad oczekuje na karę śmierci w skorumpowanym więzieniu. Zostaje "zakupiony" przez bogatego producenta telewizyjnego i zabrany na wyspę, gdzie musi walczyć na śmierć i życie z dziewięcioma innymi skazanymi zabójcami.

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: Matt Murdock egzystuje w świecie wiecznej ciemności, jednak przenikająca go czerń jest wypełniona dźwiękami, zapachami, smakami i teksturami, których inni nie są w stanie odczuć.

programme.title: Russian Raid
programme.desc: Były żołnierz Spetsnaz, Nikita, zostaje wynajęty, by przejąć kontrolę nad fabryką dla swojego nieuczciwego pracodawcy. Wkrótce odkrywa jednak, że zakład należy do groźnego watażki powiązanego z rosyjskim wojskiem.

programme.title: My Babysitter the Super Hero
programme.desc: Nastolatek i jego młodsza siostra zostają wciągnięci w pełną adrenaliny przygodę, gdy odkrywają, że ich towarzyska opiekunka jest w rzeczywistości legendarną superbohaterką znaną jako Agent-Action.

programme.title: Ślub w Boże Narodzenie
programme.desc: Po dzieciństwie spędzonym w miasteczku Pineridge Haley Foster ucieka do ogromnego Los Angeles i zostaje rozchwytywaną organizatorką wesel w elitarnej i wpływowej firmie pani Reynolds.

programme.title: Mój świąteczny hotelik
programme.desc: Gdy bizneswoman Jennifer dowiaduje się, że rodzice wyjeżdżają na Święta bez niej, postanawia porzucić życie w zabieganym San Francisco i odwiedzić hotelik swojej babci.

programme.title: Pyszne boże narodzenie
programme.desc: Walcząc o to, by utrzymać wszystko w ryzach po odziedziczeniu rodzinnej restauracji i zajazdu, samotna kobieta musi szybko znaleźć nowego szefa kuchni, by zaimponować celebrycie. Poznaje jednego i wspólnie spędzają pyszne święta Bożego Narodzenia.

programme.title: Bogus
programme.desc: Kiedy umiera matka małego chłopca, tworzy on wyimaginowanego przyjaciela, który ma mu towarzyszyć w nowym, odległym domu.

programme.title: Księga potworów
programme.desc: Sophie i jej przyjaciele muszą się zjednoczyć, aby wysłać uczestników imprezy z powrotem do piekła.

programme.title: Czerwony Duch
programme.desc: Grudzień, 1941 rok. Grupka sowieckich żołnierzy próbuje dotrzeć do swoich towarzyszy. W walce pomaga im pół-człowiek, pół-duch.

programme.title: A Chance For Christmas
programme.desc: Gwiazda mediów społecznościowych otrzymuje propozycję zostania ambasadorką marki dużej firmy, jeśli do Wigilii uda jej się zdobyć 2 miliony subskrybentów.

programme.title: Fantastyczny Pan Lis
programme.desc: Pan i Pani Lis prowadzą szczęśliwe życie ze swoim ekscentrycznym synem Ashem. Wszystko się zmienia, kiedy Pan Lis knuje intrygę by dokonać największej kradzieży kurczaków jaką widział zwierzęcy świat.

programme.title: Całe szczęście
programme.desc: Seksowna mieszkanka Manhattanu Ashley jest znana jako najszczęśliwsza kobieta w okolicy, jednak po przypadkowym spotkaniu z pechowcem o imieniu Jake, kobieta zdaje sobie sprawę z tego, że ich losy się odwróciły.

programme.title: Święta jak malowane
programme.desc: Dla doświadczającej trudności malarki Heidi Neill Boże Narodzenie w Nowym Jorku nie są wcale cudowne.

programme.title: Opowieść wigilijna
programme.desc: Współczesna wersja "Opowieści wigilijnej" Charlesa Dickensa. Carol jest odnoszącą sukcesy młodą kobietą, która żelazną ręką prowadzi wydawnictwo.

programme.title: 12 prezentów bożonarodzeniowych
programme.desc: Gdy Anna, bezrobotna malarka, nie jest w stanie związać końca z końcem, zostaje zatrudniona do zrobienia bożonarodzeniowych zakupów przez Marca, nerwowego kierownika z korporacji.

programme.title: Święta na zamówienie
programme.desc: Gretchen może zorganizować święta zawsze i wszędzie.

programme.title: Christmas Under Wraps
programme.desc: CHRISTMAS UNDER WRAPS przedstawia Candace Cameron Bure jako Dr. Lauren Brunell, która przyjmuje posadę na Alasce po stracie chłopaka i prestiżowego stypendium chirurgicznego, tylko po to, by dowiedzieć się, że to mały szpital w małym miasteczku.

programme.title: Świąteczna zamiana
programme.desc: Dwie kobiety w magiczny sposób zamieniają się ciałami podczas świąt i udzielają sobie nawzajem cennych lekcji na temat rodziny, miłości i radości Bożego Narodzenia.

programme.title: Świąteczna przemiana
programme.desc: Noelle ma idealne warunki: udaną pracę, przystojnego chłopaka i życie swoich marzeń. Brakuje tylko jednej rzeczy. Decydując się w końcu podjąć decyzję, Noelle adoptuje uroczego szczeniaka.

programme.title: Światła…Kamera… Święta!
programme.desc: Gdy w jej mieście kręcono świąteczną komedię romantyczną, potrzebni są kostiumolodzy, Kerry, lokalna właścicielka sklepu, wkracza do akcji. Podczas pracy nad filmem odkrywa na nowo swoją pasję do projektowania kostiumów i zakochuje się w Bradzie, słynnym głównym bohaterze filmu.

programme.title: Mr. Christmas
programme.desc: Mężczyzna obdarzony niezwykłym talentem do wybierania idealnych prezentów świątecznych zakochuje się w dziewczynie dawnego kolegi ze studiów.

programme.title: Zaczarowana wystawa
programme.desc: Dwoje dekoratorów staje do rywalizacji w świątecznym konkursie na najpiękniejszą wystawę sklepową w Nowym Jorku.

programme.title: Jumper
programme.desc: Thriller Science Ficition to skok w inny wymiar. JUMPER to opowieść o niezwykłych przygodach człowieka, który odkrywa, że ma ekscytującą zdolność teleportowania się, gdziekolwiek tylko zechce.

programme.title: The Bank Job
programme.desc: Martine podsuwa Terry'emu trop w sprawie niezawodnego napadu na bank na londyńskiej Baker Street. Jej celem jest pomieszczenie pełne skrytek depozytowych wartych miliony w gotówce i biżuterii, a także skarbnica brudnych sekretów.

programme.title: Redbad
programme.desc: Ten film to epopeja historyczna o powstaniu chrześcijaństwa, sagach i starożytnej legendzie zwanej Redbad.

programme.title: Marmaduke - pies na fali
programme.desc: Ekranizacja sławnej, długo nadawanego komiksu o wielkim psie o imieniu Marmaduke

programme.title: Śmiertelna Przepowiednia
programme.desc: Grupa byłych kolegów z klasy spotyka się na imprezie w przeddzień zjazdu absolwentów z okazji 10. rocznicy ukończenia szkoły średniej. Jeden po drugim zostają brutalnie zamordowani w sposób, który godny jest wpisu do kroniki szkolnej.

programme.title: A Holiday Wish Come True
programme.desc: Niedawno rozwiedzieni rodzice, Tracie i Rick, spędzają każde wakacje ze swoimi małymi córkami Harper i Avą. W te Święta Bożego Narodzenia dziewczyny mają tylko jedną rzecz na liście życzeń: spędzić Boże Narodzenie z mamą i tatą na rodzinnej farmie Tracie.

programme.title: Mój świąteczny hotelik
programme.desc: Gdy bizneswoman Jennifer dowiaduje się, że rodzice wyjeżdżają na Święta bez niej, postanawia porzucić życie w zabieganym San Francisco i odwiedzić hotelik swojej babci.

programme.title: Pyszne boże narodzenie
programme.desc: Walcząc o to, by utrzymać wszystko w ryzach po odziedziczeniu rodzinnej restauracji i zajazdu, samotna kobieta musi szybko znaleźć nowego szefa kuchni, by zaimponować celebrycie. Poznaje jednego i wspólnie spędzają pyszne święta Bożego Narodzenia.

programme.title: My Babysitter the Super Hero
programme.desc: Nastolatek i jego młodsza siostra zostają wciągnięci w pełną adrenaliny przygodę, gdy odkrywają, że ich towarzyska opiekunka jest w rzeczywistości legendarną superbohaterką znaną jako Agent-Action.

programme.title: Puppy Star Christmas
programme.desc: Rodzina Pup Star właśnie się powiększyła! Nowe szczenięta: Cindy, Rosie, Charlie i Brody poznają prawdziwe znaczenie Bożego Narodzenia. Podczas gdy złoczyńcy będą próbować zniszczyć święta, maluchy trafią na Biegu Północny i ocalić Świętego Mikołaja i ducha świąt.

programme.title: Czas diabła
programme.desc: Po trudnym dzieciństwie Ashley poszukuje połączenia i nieświadomie nawiązuje kontakt z demoniczną siłą.

programme.title: Czas diabła 2
programme.desc: Demoniczna siła opanowała miasteczko i nikt nie jest bezpieczny. Jedynym, kto zdaje się cokolwiek wiedzieć, jest pastor miasteczka.

programme.title: Lekarstwo na życie
programme.desc: Młody mężczyzna przybywa do sielankowego spa w szwajcarskich Aplach, aby zabrać stamtąd swojego szefa. Mężczyzna szybko odkrywa, że cudowne leczenie skrywa mroczny sekret.
